On how to use captions Jekyll
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19331362/using-an-image-caption-in-markdown-jekyll



Analytics
<!-- Global site tag (gtag.js) - Google Analytics -->
<script
  async
  src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=UA-167474518-1"
></script>
<script>
  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
  function gtag() {
    dataLayer.push(arguments);
  }
  gtag("js", new Date());

  gtag("config", "UA-167474518-1");
</script>

How to add
Add tag in config.yml
Set up anakytics in includes, reference the value from config
uinclude in default layout, with if to check if production

GitHub pages auto to prod
In netlify
